name: Spellbound (Ocean Software)
overview: This platform game for 1 or two players is part 2 of "Jonny and the Jimpys" and sequel to Bangers and Mash. Jonny while visiting his Grandma, finds the village under the spell of the evil witch Esmiralda. At present she is away from her castle having placed the 4 spellroom keys in dark towers near the castle.Jonny must first light the lamps to find the key and then return to the castle with it. At first Esmiralda will leave the JIMPYS to catch him. Should Jonny open the the first door she will start on her way back to the castle, throwing thunderbolts at him if he dares to touch another key. At first her powers increase as she are weak but will Can YOU help Jesse to home Tonny to open the doors and use the Book of Spells on HER before she returns and casts her evil spells on HIM?. Jonny has one friend in the form of a green goblin who will send the JIMPYS on their way!
